body_html: Thanks for the PR, but I think we should try to look for alternative ways to add support for CPU training. Right now this adds a third possible code path, for a third backend, and that's just going to be unmaintainable in the long run. It's not using most of hte code in this file, which suggests that it might be better to just make it a class in a separate file.

body: Thanks for the PR, but I think we should try to look for alternative ways to add support for CPU training. Right now this adds a third possible code path, for a third backend, and that's just going to be unmaintainable in the long run. It's not using most of hte code in this file, which suggests that it might be better to just make it a class in a separate file.
